connection_string.description: Connection string to connect to the database. This can be a URL or a DSN, as per official [neo4j docs](https://neo4j.com/docs/browser-manual/current/operations/dbms-connection/#uri-scheme).

username.description: Username to connect to the database.

password.description: Password to connect to the database.

batch_size.description: Number of records to batch together before sending to the database.

batch_size_bytes.description: Number of bytes (as Arrow buffer size) to batch together before sending to the database.
